RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPLEMAN ALLEY chased the early pace from the inside, moved up three to four wide in the stretch run and got up late under strong handling. THE EQUINEST stalked the pace, moved up five wide into the upper stretch, had a clear lead near the sixteenth pole but couldn't hold off the winner late in a game effort. OLD FORTY FIVE raced mid pack early on, altered course near the three sixteenths pole, raced three to wide in the drive and finished willingly to the wire. COAL TOWN ROAD showed good early foot to set the early pace and weakened the final eighth of a mile. BAYOU SHACK pressed the pace from the inside and gave way. MR. LUCKY dropped back early, raced five wide near the three sixteenths pole and never was a factor. BALI BEACH failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Templeman Alley
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Cowles Joe R

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Star Bird Eye Synd LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5wd upper stretch, clear 1/16, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 21. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSE RING pressed the early leader from the outside, engaged in a long drive and just got up under strong handling. CHARGAREE vied for the early lead from the inside, dug in and just missed in a game effort. TURN TO ME SUCREE stalked the top pair, raced near the inside past the quarter pole, angled out and raced even with no closing run on the top pair. CASCABRIA dropped back early, raced three to four wide around the far turn and never was a factor. ROMANTIC JEWEL was forwardly placed early on and failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Cascabria
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3-4 wide turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Romantic Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, long drive, just up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOCTOR WU stalked the pace, raced near the rail around the far turn, angled near the three sixteenths pole and got up under strong handling. CENTSOFWANDER chased the early pace, moved up from the outside through the upper stretch and finished willingly to the wire. WELLMAN pressed the pace, raced three to four wide around the far turn, led near the eighth pole and was outkicked to the wire. BAD LITTLE BEAST raced off the early pace, moved up four wide near the quarter pole, angled widest through the lane and moved up late to improve position. AGNELLO'S DREAM pressed the pace from the inside and weakened. FORTY STRIPES was slow early on, raced four to three wide in the lane and had not enough. TALKTOEACHOTHER vied for the early lead while racing three wide from the outside foes and gave way in the drive. WHISKEY SUNRISE was hustled from the inside and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Little Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4wd 1/4, angled widest lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rail turn, angled 3/16, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James

ENTRY.NAME: Talktoeachother
ENTRY.OWNER: Puro Candelas LLC Candelas Jovany and Lawson Rachael

ENTRY.NAME: Wellman
ENTRY.OWNER: Brumley, Jerry S. and Reed, Kay

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 24300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIVATE DRIVE pressed the pace from three deep while racing from the outside of rivals and finished well to get up under all out pressure. KISSINGER was off slowly, made an advance through the far turn, raced two wide near the quarter pole, angled seven wide into the upper stretch and closed in well late. CLASSIC MO dueled along the rail down the backstretch through the far turn and weakened a bit the final eighth of a mile. OAKEN was off the early going, asked through the far turn, fanned wide into the lane and made a good late gain to moved up. SHOW SLIDING HOME dropped back early on, raced four to five wide around the far turn and had no late rally. THIS MAN CAN dueled from the outside of rival in the two path and gave way. This Man Can fell soon after the wire and walked off the track under her own power. KID RUSSELL raced near the inside around the far turn through the stretch and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Kissinger
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, 2wd 1/4, swung 7wd upper stretch, closing in

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4-5 wide turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Quezada Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, fanned wide upper stretch, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: This Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, gave way, fell after wire, walked off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm & WinStar Farm, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 96. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLOOD MOON prompt the early pace from the outside of foes while racing four deep, dug from the inside of rival in the drive and prevailed under all out pressure. GIANT CRITIC rated along in the early stages, made a bold three wide bid near the three eighths pole, finished gamely to the wire and just missed. KLAATU was sent along early to set the early pace from the inside and weakened in the stretch drive. ZERO GRAVITY was unhurried early on, raced four deep near the quarter pole and moved up to improve position while racing from the outside. SMASH pressed the pace while racing three wide and gave way. ROYAL DRAGOON was slow early on, raced near the inside around the far turn through the stretch and passed tired rivals late. BOURBON WISDOM dropped back off the early going, raced three wide near the quarter pole and had no response. BLAME IT ON EDDIE failed to respond. GIZMO JONES pressed the pace while racing between rivals and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 4wd outside foes, dug inside, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 21. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KING OF THE RING showed good early speed, collared near the quarter pole, dug in and drew off to be well clear under steady handling. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF dropped back early on, made a strong two wide bid near the five sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner in the drive. TAMANRASSETT stalked the pace from the inside and raced evenly with no closing run on the top pair. QUESTION AUTHORITY prompt the pace from the outside, raced five wide near the half mile pole and weakened in the drive. BALTIC FLEET was coaxed along three wide while racing between rivals and tired. ADANO raced three wide near the quarter pole, angled out through the upper stretch and had no late rally. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX stalked the pace, raced four wide past the quarter pole and faded. GEH SCHNELL was slow early and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Adano
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: King of the Ring
ENTRY.OWNER: Pappada Julie A and Ella D Racing Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 21. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AZTEC EMPIRE raced in tight at the start, settled off the early going, made an advance towards the leaders through the far turn, raced near the rail in the stretch run, surged late and just got up under strong handling. DEBDURITE lunged at the break, forced a bit wide to race five deep into the first turn, made a three wide bid to take over near the three eighths pole, was clear near the sixteenth pole and was caught on the wire in a game effort. GOTSOMEMOJO was slow early on, moved up through the far turn, fanned wide into the upper stretch and rallied strongly late to close in on the top pair. KING ANDRES stalked the pace, raced four to three wide and weakened in the drive. SAY HEY KID dropped back early off the early pace, raced six deep near the three sixteenths pole and had no late rally. AREYOUTALKINGTOME raced with the second flight early on, was four deep near the quarter pole and had no response. GET HAMMERED settled off the early going, raced three to four wide through the far turn and never threatened. THIRSTY ACTOR pressed the pace from the inside and fave way. PIONEER DANCER failed to sustain a bid. VALEROSO showed good early foot to set the pace from the outside and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, fanned wide upper stretch, closing in

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3-4 wide far turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Aztec Empire
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, settled, rail bid, surged, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Valeroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged break, 5wd 1st turn, 3wd bid 3/8, clear 1/16, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOTSA MATCHA was rated along down the backstretch, asked through the far turn while racing four wide and drove clear late under steady handling. TIER ONE stalked the pace along the inside, kept on to the wire to finish second best but was no match for the winner while racing two deep. MR. BALI was allowed to settle early on, raced three wide into the stretch, angled out and moved up late to improve position. GRAY DAY settled to race mid pack early, was five deep near the three sixteenths pole and had no final bid. HARSH TRUTH was slow early, raced three to two wide in the drive and had not enough. MAN'S CHOICE stalked the pace from the outside, raced along the inside through the upper stretch and lacked a bid. PAYMASTER GENERAL raced with the second flight, raced four wide in the stretch run and had no response. BAD BOY BOOGIE sprinted clear and was empty just past the three sixteenths pole. CONSTITUTION COAL stalked the pace, raced along the inside around the far turn and faded. STAGE NAME tracked the early leader from the inside and gave way. COUNCIL OF FOUR raced mid pack early and failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3-wide, angled out, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Council of Four
ENTRY.OWNER: Aurora Racing Sheppell Peter J and Royer Family Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Paymaster General
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Stage Name
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, inside upper stretch, lacked bid
